location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter states that William Bruce has received letters from Bahrain informing him of the death of Saood Saud [Imam Saud al kabeer bin Abdul-Aziz bin Muhammad bin Saud], the Wahabee [Wahabi] Chief, on the 10 April 1814. Bruce reports that the late Chief has been succeeded by his eldest son, Abdolla Bensaood [Abdullah bin Saud], who has entrusted the management of his affairs to his brothers, and has embarked on an expedition against the Nejed [Najd] Arabs.
